titleStmt.title: Spiritus sanctus est persona distincta patri filioque coëssentualis & ab utrique procedens
titleStmt.author: Barrow, Isaac, 1630-1677.

notesStmt.note: Colophon reads: "Julii 4, 1670. In vesperiis comit. respond. Isaaco Barrow, pro gradu s. theol. doct. Coll. Trin. soc."
Includes: "Episcopo Romano nulla in ecclesiam Anglicanam jurisdictio competit."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
